data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kashima throw-in in Kobe's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in Kobe.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kobe.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 10, Kashima to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashima's Juan Alano gets in a shot on goal at Noevir Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Tomoya Inukai hits the post with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Kashima in Kobe.
Ayase Ueda is on target to give Kashima a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 12, Kento Misao instrumental with a fine assist.
Kashima drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Kyogo Furuhashi for Kobe drives towards goal at Noevir Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Kobe in the half of Kashima.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 22, Kobe push forward at Noevir Stadium and Junya Tanaka gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashima defence.
Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
In the minute 24, Kobe have a goal kick.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Goal kick for Kashima at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kashima.
Kashima's Leo Silva breaks free at Noevir Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 30, Kobe have a goal kick.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kobe throw-in in Kashima's half.
Free kick Kobe.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Kashima.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 37, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 38, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Kashima a goal kick.
Kobe pushes forward through Takuya Yasui, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kashima just outside Kobe's area.
In the minute 42, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Ryuji Izumi extends Kashima's lead to 0-2.
Juan Alano with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Free kick in a good position for Kobe!
Corner awarded to Kobe.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Noevir Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 46, Atsuhiro Miura is making the team's first substitution at Noevir Stadium with Sergi Samper replacing Takuya Yasui.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Free kick Kobe.
Goal kick for Kashima at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 52, Kobe needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Juan Alano (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 56, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 60, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Kashima's area.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Noriaki Fujimoto (Kobe) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Kashima.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 64, Kobe drive upfield and Noriaki Fujimoto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashima defender.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 66, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kobe.
Ryo Hatsuse (Kobe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 68, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Zago (Kashima) is making a first substitution, with Everaldo replacing Ayase Ueda.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 70, Dyanfrez Douglas is replacing Noriaki Fujimoto for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kobe throw-in in Kashima's half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 73, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kobe.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 76, In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kashima throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 78, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Kashima take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Shoma Doi.
Great play from Juan Alano to set up the goal.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Ryota Nagaki is on a sub for Kento Misao for Kashima.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Kashima.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 85, Daigo Nishi (Kobe) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Kashima defenders.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Kashima will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kobe.
In Kobe, Andres Iniesta of Kobe is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Juan Alano with Ryotaro Araki.
The away team have replaced Shoma Doi with Sho Ito. This is the fourth substitution made today by Zago.
Ryuho Kikuchi (Kobe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 89, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Kashima.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
